entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Why does Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SNI.dll get published under runtimes? #26175
  • "dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold" can't find connection string (NullReferenceException in NamedConnectionStringResolver) #26169
  • Model differ cannot alter column when type mapping is missing #26168
  • .Set<> then .Any() fails after second time with .NET 6.0.100-rc.1.21458.32 / Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer 6.0.0-rc.1.21452.10 #26167
  • Idempotent migration script generates problematic temporal table alter statement #26166
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26174
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [6.0] Remove excessive spaces from XML doc comments #26170
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26161
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [6.0] Code cleanup for remaining product projects #26164
